articles.author: Bailey Schulz
articles.title: DOJ's Visa antitrust lawsuit alleges debit card company monopoly - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Justice Department is accusing Visa of running a debit card monopoly that has hiked fees for American consumers and businesses.
articles.content: The Justice Department has filed an antitrust lawsuit against Visa, accusing the company of running a debit card monopoly that imposed billions of dollars worth of additional fees on American consume… [+4091 chars]
